messages.title: What our community has to say about your local Labour Team

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's guarantee of work or training for 18-24 year olds.

mentions.candidate: Clive has always worked hard for local people and that's why we're backing him.

issues.governance: The system won't improve if we vote out the good guys.

housing.content: Support our local Labour team's campaign to help clean up New Eltham's shopping area.

endorsements.endorsement: As someone who has lived in New Eltham for many years I've seen the massive difference Clive and the Labour Council has made.

Clive has always been there for people when they have needed his help. Local people need an MP who is committed to the local community. Clive has always worked hard for local people and that's why we're backing him.
Like a lot of people, I was disgusted by the expenses scandal but at the same time I was proud that our local MP proved to be honest.
